main event: A military observation noted a visual sighting of a possible satellite at an altitude of 42Â° above the horizon on January 31, 1962.
interesting points: The object was reported as being the size of a fingernail seen for 2 minutes,An echo was detected at a different location coinciding with the sighting,Multiple codes and technical terms were used in the report,The location was at 34N 176W,There was speculation that the object might have been the satellite Echo but the heading was inconsistent.
